description: PWGSC, on behalf of Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC), is issuing this Request For Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of a wood chipper mounted on trailer including delivery, installation, training located in Cap Tourmente National Wildlife Area, as detailed in Annex - Requirement.",
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement: Trailer-Mounted Branch Shredder**
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

### Tender Details
| **Tender Identifier** | **Tender Number** | **End Date** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| K2C58-240618 | WS4408860962 | February 13, 2024, at 14:00:00 EST |

### Abstract
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC) in collaboration with the Department of the Environment (ECCC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply and delivery of a trailer-mounted branch shredder.  The equipment will be used at the Cap Tourmente National Wildlife Area.

### Essential Contract Information

* **Contracting Authority**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity**: Department of the Environment (ECCC)
* **Location of Work**: Cap Tourmente National Wildlife Area, Quebec, Canada
* **Duration of Work**: N/A

### Technical Requirements

* **Supplied Equipment**: Trailer-mounted branch shredder
* **Delivery, Installation, and Training**: Included

### Selection Criteria

* **Award Criteria**: Lowest price

### Trade Agreements

* **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**

### Procurement Method
* **Method of Procurement**: Competitive - Open Bidding

### Contact Information

* **Contracting Officer**: Langis, Sonia
* **Email:** sonia.langis@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice and Tender URL**: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18619693?extsite=MTg2MTk2OTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18619693?extsite=MTg2MTk2OTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) 

### Required Following of Instructions and Regulations
All contractors must strictly follow the instructions and regulations published in the notice and any subsequent information provided throughout the tendering process.
